about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a third-year Computer Engineering student at TecnolÃ³gico de Costa Rica, driven by a passion for problem-solving, self-learning, and continuous growth. I enjoy tackling new challenges and expanding my knowledge both personally and professionally.
about.skills: I enjoy working on both frontend and backend technologies and continuously explore new tools to enhance my skills.

list.title: Spotify Mobile App
list.description: A React Native mobile application using Expo, integrated with the Spotify API.

list.title: Book Event
list.description: An application designed to streamline the event venue reservation process, built using Supabase and Nuxt 3.

list.title: Tecflix Movie Search
list.description: A web platform for searching and managing movies using The Movie Database (TMDb) API. Built with React, React Router DOM, and Bootstrap. Features include adding movies to favorites and viewing movie details.

list.title: Pet Health Tracker
list.description: A Progressive Web Application (PWA) for veterinary management. The web app is for veterinarian administration, the mobile app is for clients, and the backend handles the database using FastAPI.

list.title: DVD Rental
list.description: A project focused on data replication and analysis using PostgreSQL and Tableau for data visualization and insights.

list.title: IoT Digital Assistant
list.description: An IoT project for a digital assistant using Python and ADB to manage and automate tasks.

list.title: Manage My Stock
list.description: A CRUD application for inventory management aimed at small businesses. Built using Supabase and React.

list.title: Spark ETL
list.description: Extract, transform, and load data using SparkSQL, PostgreSQL, and Jupyter notebooks.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.ccnaSwitchingRouting: CCNA: Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials
